replies.author: lipww123
replies.txt_content:
gundamMC 发表于 2016-10-10 12:30
qwq话说。。。YggdrasilRefresh登陆后刷新的token要怎么获取。。
先蟹蟹了owo
往 https://authserver.mojang.com/authenticate 发送一个 POST 请求，内容如下
{
  "agent":{"name":"Minecraft","version":1},
  "username":"Minecraft 用户名/邮箱",
  "password":"密码",
}
提醒:头要加个 Content-Type: application/json
返回里面就有Token
